subject: VIGS: Implement plane flip/rotate
commitMessage:
VIGS: Implement plane flip/rotate

Planes can now be horizontally/vertically flipped
and rotated by 90, 180 or 270 degrees

Signed-off-by: Stanislav Vorobiov <s.vorobiov@samsung.com>

And btw, vigs_drm.h in kernel and libdrm match, the only difference is the copyright header, it was added to libdrm by someone, but not to kernel. I decided to not change this and only modify the code from that point. If it's ok, you can add the copyright header to kernel and then vigs_drm.h will be exactly the same and confusion will be avoided

subject: VIGS: Support DP memory
commitMessage:
VIGS: Support DP memory

DP memory is used by some of the tizen
gstreamer plugins, TBM and X.Org video driver.
Its main purpose is to share GEM buffers between
media decoding and presentation layers

Change-Id: Ie377119b46d6033355bf6ce00adc01e36096742a
Signed-off-by: Stanislav Vorobiov <s.vorobiov@samsung.com>

subject: drm: ipptest: support ipp dynamic color range
commitMessage:
drm: ipptest: support ipp dynamic color range

This patch supports dynamic range for color space conversion.
COLOR_RANGE_LIMITED: selects narrow -> Y(16 to 235), Cb/Cr(16 to 240)
COLOR_RANGE_FULL: selects wide -> Y/Cb/Cr(0 to 255), Wide default

Change-Id: I94190ac3f3630904d2461e226d34378ac2b82b9d
Signed-off-by: Donghwa Lee <dh09.lee@samsung.com>

subject: ipptest: add fimc and rotator test applications
commitMessage:
ipptest: add fimc and rotator test applications

This patch adds two applications to test fimc and rotator
device drivers.

These devices are controlled by IPP(Integrated Post Processor)
framework of Exynos drm, and this patch updates IPP relevant
header and includes relevant test applications.

Change-Id: I3a0384375a082855162f5821c000389e234d5c15
Signed-off-by: Inki Dae <inki.dae@samsung.com>

subject: libdrm_vigs: Fence support added
commitMessage:
libdrm_vigs: Fence support added

VIGS kernel driver now supports fences, so
update libdrm to expose them to user space

Change-Id: I9c07084a357c0a8dc87c049e01238f9049ca0828
Signed-off-by: Stanislav Vorobiov <s.vorobiov@samsung.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

Seems good

Was the patch forwarded upstream ?
If yes you can put the tracker URL too

Patch Set 1:

VIGS is virtual GPU for Tizen emulator, it's not in upstream

Patch Set 1:

Looks like I don't have merge rights in this repo, can someone merge please

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Can someone merge this please, the changes in this commit are needed by other packages

Patch Set 1:

I can merge it but I am not maintainer of it ... who is maintaining it ? I could be but I am not familiar with this code

Patch Set 1:

I'm maintaining vigs and this commit is related to vigs part of libdrm. It so happens that libdrm contains code related to different GPUs so I guess there's no single maintainer that's responsible for everything...

subject: libdrm_vigs added
commitMessage:
libdrm_vigs added

Change-Id: Ie67c19bdb4a6f9e2190dbb4d3f825e878fca3635
Signed-off-by: Stanislav Vorobiov <s.vorobiov@samsung.com>
Signed-off-by: Jinhyung Jo <jinhyung.jo@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

(1 comment)
Uploaded patch set 2.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2:

Is it special for IVI or mobile or both?

Do you have verified it and any released reports or doc for that?

Patch Set 2:

It's for both IVI and mobile.

It's being moved from RSA, it hasn't been verified yet on tizen.org.

>any released reports or doc for that?
Not sure what you mean. There has to be some document attached ?

Patch Set 2:

>any released reports or doc for that?Not sure what you mean. There has to be some document attached ?

No, I am just curious what this patch is for. If it is for mobile, seems we need to add mobile tag and avoid adding additional library for IVI repo since it is a upstream version.

Patch Set 2:

This patch is for emulator DRM support. It's used both for mobile and IVI emulator. Users of this are:
* emulator OpenGL implementation - emulator-yagl, it haven't been uploaded here yet
* tbm
* X.Org video driver for emulator, not uploaded yet

Patch Set 2:

Anyone has verified that in emulator?

Hi, Stanislav Vorobiov

If you have verified that, I will approve that.

Patch Set 2:

I have built them in mobile and ivi environment. It is fine for both. But for implementation, I am not sure. If someone has verified in the real environment, please plus 1 for verified. 
Thanks

Patch Set 2:

Currently I can't test this since SDK doesn't use images built from tizen.org. This is currently in progress, once it's done I'll be able to test
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2
Patch Set 2: Verified+1

Patch Set 2: Verified+1

Verified, can be merged

Patch Set 1:

The tag submit/tizen/20130710.132346 is pushed, but this submission failed because of following reason(s):

- The commit 41cea49fad5aa12c678a32f3a3fa12e728ea5ac1 tag attached does NOT exist in git tree or gerrit open change. Please make sure the commit has been pushed to gerrit and correct magical ref refs/for/branch.

Suggest to use "gbs submit" to trigger submission, or use following command to create tag "git tag submit/${version}/$(date --utc +%%Y%%m%%d.%%H%%M%%S) -m "****" ".
